titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the protection of Sir William Brereton, in the county of Chester, who hath lately been proclaimed a traytor by His Majesty
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "January 12, 1642. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Paliament, that this declaration be forthwith printed and published and read in all parish churches and chappels in the
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
